newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-REFEREE BARKING UP THE WRONG TREE, SAYS DISMISSED PLAYER.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-REFEREE BARKING UP THE WRONG TREE, SAYS DISMISSED PLAYER.

text.p: A Spanish first division player sent off for talking to the referee as if he were calling a dog claims he was only fooling around.
"Given the situation, I invited the referee to take the kick-off with me. It was a joke," said Logrones striker Manel Martinez, whose side had just conceded an eighth goal to Barcelona.
But referee Brito Arceo was far from amused.
In his official match report, Arceo said Manel had spoken to him "in a vulgar way and as if he were talking to a dog...with sounds emitted from the mouth.
"I'm not prepared for them to make fun of me."
